title: Moving charges - electron enters a magnetic field

content.prompt: An electron is moving to the right when it enters a region of magnetic field that is directed into the page. Which of the following claims correctly identifies the direction of the magnetic force the electron experiences the moment it first enters the magnetic field?

choices.label: Toward the bottom of the page
Toward the top of the page

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
